GeneDef.label: Caste: Rare
GeneDef.description:
This gene only has an effect under very specific circumstances : when a pawn with multiple Offspring genes reproduces, or when a pawn with multiple Metamorphosis genes metamorphoses.

If any of the potential resulting xenotypes include this gene, then that xenotype is only 25% as likely to be chosen as it would otherwise be.

Include this gene in xenotypes you want to be rare outcomes of birth/metamorphosis. By including other caste genes in the other options, you can further adjust the ratios.
